caption.title: Phylogenetic tree obtained by Bayesian Inference with node supports.
caption.p: Each terminal is identified for sample name followed by country of origin, State was included in Brazilian samples. Clusters recovered by BAPS are identified after the terminals for P. guyannensis (G1, G2, G3, G4) and P. cuvieri (C1, C2, C3, C4).
Click here for additional data file.
